title: Seal Doors
data:
***Version [0.30](/0.30 "0.30")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

|   |                                                                                                             |
| - | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | Imparts seals on nearby doors and stairs, preventing those not allied with the caster from traversing them. |

**Seal Doors** is a monster-only spell which seals shut not only [doors](/Door "Door"), but [stairs](/Stairs "Stairs") as well, making them impassible/unusable by the player until the duration of the effect ends, the [vault warden](/Vault_warden "Vault warden") which created the seal is killed, or the seal has been destroyed. The seal lasts for 8-15 turns.[\[1\]](#cite_note-1) A door that is sealed shut will immediately shove any items, creatures, or even players out of the way in the process of closing; there is no way to prevent the effect. Even broken doors can be sealed -- this will leave behind a functional door once the seal wears off.

Normally it affects all doors and stairs in an 8-tile radius around the vault warden, but there is a [tension](/Tension "Tension") mechanic that tries to avoid trapping dangerous monsters behind an affected door, and a door that the vault warden is standing in will not be affected.

The following enemies cast Seal Doors:

- p [![Vault warden.png](/images/0/05/Vault_warden.png)](/File:Vault_warden.png) **[Vault warden](/Vault_warden "Vault warden")**

### Opening or destroying a sealed door

There are a few ways to destroy a sealed door:

- [Shatter](/Shatter "Shatter")
- [Lugonu](/Lugonu "Lugonu")'s *Corrupt* ability
- [Fedhas](/Fedhas "Fedhas")' *Overgrow* ability

Sealed staircases cannot be destroyed (and in any event that would be useless).

Sealed doors can, however, be opened by monsters, usually because they were aware of you but on the other side of the door when it closed. This breaks the seal, but the tension mechanic makes this unlikely. It is possible to leave via the door when this happens, but it is likely the vault warden will recast the spell soon.

## History

- Prior to [0.22](/0.22 "0.22"), [Lee's Rapid Deconstruction](/Lee%27s_Rapid_Deconstruction "Lee's Rapid Deconstruction") could be used to destroy sealed doors.
- Prior to [0.20](/0.20 "0.20"), [wands of disintegration](/Wands_of_disintegration "Wands of disintegration") and [Orb of Destruction](/Orb_of_Destruction "Orb of Destruction") could destroy doors.
- Prior to [0.13](/0.13 "0.13"), Seal Doors was not able to seal stairways, and sealed doors could be affected by [digging](/Digging "Digging") and [disintegration](/Disintegration "Disintegration").
- Seal Doors was added in [0.12](/0.12 "0.12") along with the vault wardens.

## References

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [mon-cast.cc:2309](https://github.com/crawl/crawl/blob/0.30.1/crawl-ref/source/mon-cast.cc#L2309) (0.30.1)

Seal Doors

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.30: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
Imparts seals on nearby doors and stairs, preventing those not allied with the caster from traversing them.

Seal Doors is a monster-only spell which seals shut not only doors, but stairs as well, making them impassible/unusable by the player until the duration of the effect ends, the vault warden which created the seal is killed, or the seal has been destroyed. The seal lasts for 8-15 turns.[1] A door that is sealed shut will immediately shove any items, creatures, or even players out of the way in the process of closing; there is no way to prevent the effect. Even broken doors can be sealed -- this will leave behind a functional door once the seal wears off.

Normally it affects all doors and stairs in an 8-tile radius around the vault warden, but there is a tension mechanic that tries to avoid trapping dangerous monsters behind an affected door, and a door that the vault warden is standing in will not be affected.

The following enemies cast Seal Doors:

  • p Vault warden

Opening or destroying a sealed door

There are a few ways to destroy a sealed door:

  • Shatter
  • Lugonu's Corrupt ability
  • Fedhas' Overgrow ability

Sealed staircases cannot be destroyed (and in any event that would be useless).

Sealed doors can, however, be opened by monsters, usually because they were aware of you but on the other side of the door when it closed. This breaks the seal, but the tension mechanic makes this unlikely. It is possible to leave via the door when this happens, but it is likely the vault warden will recast the spell soon.

History

  • Prior to 0.22, Lee's Rapid Deconstruction could be used to destroy sealed doors.
  • Prior to 0.20, wands of disintegration and Orb of Destruction could destroy doors.
  • Prior to 0.13, Seal Doors was not able to seal stairways, and sealed doors could be affected by digging and disintegration.
  • Seal Doors was added in 0.12 along with the vault wardens.

References

  1. ↑ mon-cast.cc:2309 (0.30.1)

{{version030}}
{{flavour|Imparts seals on nearby doors and stairs, preventing those not allied with the caster from traversing them.}}
'''Seal Doors''' is a monster-only spell which seals shut not only [[door]]s, but [[stairs]] as well, making them impassible/unusable by the player until the duration of the effect ends, the [[vault warden]] which created the seal is killed, or the seal has been destroyed. The seal lasts for 8-15 turns.<ref>{{source ref|0.30.1|mon-cast.cc|2309}}</ref> A door that is sealed shut will immediately shove any items, creatures, or even players out of the way in the process of closing; there is no way to prevent the effect. Even broken doors can be sealed -- this will leave behind a functional door once the seal wears off.

Normally it affects all doors and stairs in an 8-tile radius around the vault warden, but there is a [[tension]] mechanic that tries to avoid trapping dangerous monsters behind an affected door, and a door that the vault warden is standing in will not be affected.

{{monsters with spell}}

===Opening or destroying a sealed door===
There are a few ways to destroy a sealed door:
*[[Shatter]]
*[[Lugonu]]'s ''Corrupt'' ability
*[[Fedhas]]' ''Overgrow'' ability

Sealed staircases cannot be destroyed (and in any event that would be useless).

Sealed doors can, however, be opened by monsters, usually because they were aware of you but on the other side of the door when it closed. This breaks the seal, but the tension mechanic makes this unlikely. It is possible to leave via the door when this happens, but it is likely the vault warden will recast the spell soon.

==History==
*Prior to [[0.22]], [[Lee's Rapid Deconstruction]] could be used to destroy sealed doors.
*Prior to [[0.20]], [[wands of disintegration]] and [[Orb of Destruction]] could destroy doors.
*Prior to [[0.13]], Seal Doors was not able to seal stairways, and sealed doors could be affected by [[digging]] and [[disintegration]]. 
*Seal Doors was added in [[0.12]] along with the vault wardens.
